programme.title: The Machine
programme.desc: Bert, a stand-up comedian known as 'The Machine', is targeted by the Russian mob when his hard-partying past catches up with him 20 years down the road. Bert and his father are kidnapped to atone for those he wronged, and together they must re-trace the steps of his younger self while attempting to find common ground in their often fraught relationship. programme.title: The Three Musketeers: D'Artagnan
programme.desc: In 1627, gifted swordsman D'Artagnan heads to Paris with a letter of recommendation addressed to Captain De Treville, commander of the Musketeers. En route, D'Artagnan unknowingly interrupts a diabolical plot orchestrated by Milady. programme.desc: Brooklyn plumbers Mario and Luigi are fixing a leak to a water main when they are transported down a mysterious pipe into a magical land. The brothers are subsequently separated and Mario embarks on a quest to track down Luigi, assisted by Princess Peach, ruler of Mushroom Kingdom. Animated adventure based on the computer game series, with the voices of Chris Pratt and Anya Taylor-Joy Aaron Horvath - Director Michael Jelenic - Director Chris Pratt - Mario Anya Taylor-Joy - Princess Peach Charlie Day - Luigi Jack Black - Bowser Keegan-Michael Key - Toad Seth Rogen - Donkey Kong Fred Armisen - Cranky Kong.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Family, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Teenager Miles Morales is reunited with Gwen Stacy and encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting the multiverse. The emergence of a deadly new threat divides opinion on the best course of action and Miles finds himself pitted against former allies. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Shameik Moore and Hailee Steinfeld Joaquim Dos Santos - Director Kemp Powers - Director Justin K Thompson - Director Shameik Moore - Miles Morales / Spider-Man Hailee Steinfeld - Gwen Stacy / Spider-Woman Oscar Isaac - Miguel O'Hara / Spider-Man 2099 Issa Rae - Jessica Drew / Spider-Woman Jake Johnson - Peter B Parker / Spider-Man.

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: The Daughters of Atlas, aka Hespera, Kalypso and Anthea, arrive on Earth in search of stolen magic. The vengeful ancient gods threaten humanity, and the only brave souls standing in their destructive path are Shazam and his brightly costumed compatriots. programme.title: Silent Night
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a grieving father enacts his long-awaited revenge against a ruthless gang. Director John Woo's action thriller, starring Joel Kinnaman and Catalina Sandino Moreno John Woo - Director Joel Kinnaman - Brian Godlock Kid Cudi - Detective Dennis Vassel Catalina Sandino Moreno - Saya Godlock Harold Torres - Playa.

programme.title: Allelujah
programme.desc: A community hospital in Yorkshire affectionately known as the Beth is threatened with closure. The chairman of the hospital trust invites a film crew to spend time on the Shirley Bassey and Dusty Springfield geriatric wards, interviewing Sister Gilpin, Dr Valentine and the residents. Comedy drama, starring Jennifer Saunders, Judi Dench and Derek Jacobi Richard Eyre - Director.

programme.title: The Machine
programme.desc: Bert, a stand-up comedian known as 'The Machine', is targeted by the Russian mob when his hard-partying past catches up with him 20 years down the road. Bert and his father are kidnapped to atone for those he wronged, and together they must re-trace the steps of his younger self while attempting to find common ground in their often fraught relationship. Action comedy, starring Bert Kreischer and Mark Hamill Peter Atencio - Director Bert Kreischer - Bert Mark Hamill - Albert Jimmy Tatro - Young Bert Iva Babic - Irina Stephanie Kurtzuba - LeeAnn Jess Gabor - Sasha Robert Maaser - Alexei.

programme.title: A Thousand And One
programme.desc: Inez de la Paz serves time at Rikers Island and returns home to New York. Her six-year-old son Terry has been placed in foster care in her absence, but when he has an accident, Inez spirits Terry out of the foster care system without permission and raises her boy under a different name. Crime drama, starring Teyana Taylor A V Rockwell - Director Teyana Taylor - Inez William Catlett - Lucky Josiah Cross - Terry Aven Courtney - Terry (Age 13) Aaron Kingsley Adetola - Terry (Age 6) Terri Abney - Kim Jones.

programme.title: Love Again
programme.desc: A young woman forms an unlikely connection with the man her dead fiancé's phone number has been reassigned to. Romantic comedy, starring Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Sam Heughan, Russell Tovey and Celia Imrie Jim Strouse - Director.

programme.title: Dance First
programme.desc: In 1969 Stockholm, Samuel Beckett is due to receive the Nobel Prize for Literature at a ceremony attended by his wife Suzanne and dignitaries. As he ascends the stage to accept the honour, Beckett sparks a conversation with himself about events and people that have led him to this point. Drama, starring Gabriel Byrne and Aidan Gillen James Marsh - Director Gabriel Byrne - Samuel Beckett Fionn O'Shea - Younger Samuel Beckett Bronagh Gallagher - Nora Joyce Robert Aramayo - Alfred Péron Maxine Peake - Barbara Bray Aidan Gillen - James Joyce.

programme.title: Mummies
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Crime/detective, Fantasy, Musical, Romance, Children's, Arts And Culture ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Three mummies are transported to present-day London and embark on a journey in search of a valuable ring. Animated family comedy, with the voices of Joe Thomas, Eleanor Tomlinson, Hugh Bonneville, Celia Imrie and Sean Bean Juan Jesús García Galocha - Director Joe Thomas - Thut Eleanor Tomlinson - Nefer Sean Bean - Pharaoh Hugh Bonneville - Lord Sylvester Carnaby Celia Imrie - Mother Carnaby Santiago Winder - Sekhem.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: D'Artagnan
programme.desc: In 1627, gifted swordsman D'Artagnan heads to Paris with a letter of recommendation addressed to Captain De Treville, commander of the Musketeers. En route, D'Artagnan unknowingly interrupts a diabolical plot orchestrated by Milady. programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Premier League history. This episode features the best of Thierry Henry's 175 top-flight goals.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man U/Chelsea'00
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Manchester United take on Chelsea back in September 2000 in a thrilling game that saw six goals.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Chelsea/Man Utd 1999
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Chelsea meet Manchester United back in October 1999 in what was an excellent game for the Blues.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games: B'ming/A.Villa
programme.desc: A classic Premier League clash between Birmingham and Aston Villa in 2002. There was an intense atmosphere at St Andrew's with just a single point separating the bitter rivals.

programme.title: PL Greatest: WBA v Man Utd 2013
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, West Bromwich Albion take on Man Utd back in 2013 in a ten-goal thriller in what was Sir Alex Ferguson's final game in charge.

programme.title: PL 30: Ferguson's First Title
programme.desc: Steve Bruce's brace against Sheffield Wednesday sets Manchester United on the way to their maiden Premier League title.

programme.title: PL 30: The House That Jack Built
programme.desc: During the 1994-1995 campaign, Blackburn Rovers wrote their name into the history books, as Alan Shearer's 34 goals steered the Ewood Park outfit towards Premier League immortality.

programme.title: PL 30: The Game Of The Century
programme.desc: Revisit Liverpool and Newcastle's meeting at Anfield in April 1996, one that epitomises the Premier League, as Collymore's stoppage time winner capped off a frantic end-to-end encounter.

programme.title: PL 30: Bergkamp's Wonder Goal
programme.desc: Brought to England's top flight by Bruce Rioch, Dennis Bergkamp graced the Premier League for 11 seasons and produced moment after moment, including this one against Newcastle.

programme.title: PL 30: The Invincibles
programme.desc: The crowning glory in Arsene Wenger's storied Arsenal career - the season he guided the men from Highbury to an entire season unbeaten, as the 03-04 campaign became one to remember.

programme.title: PL 30: The Special One
programme.desc: After announcing himself as 'The Special One' at the beginning of his appointment, Jose Mourinho emphatically delivered, as the Portuguese led Chelsea to their first Premier League title.

programme.title: PL 30: Rooney's Bicycle Kick
programme.desc: The career of Wayne Rooney is littered with iconic moments that defined his talent, but none more so than his Manchester Derby-winning bicycle kick, leaving Joe Hart rooted to the spot.

programme.title: PL 30: Aguero Wins City The Title
programme.desc: A moment that is etched into Premier League folklore, Sergio Aguero's iconic goal in the dying embers against QPR that won Manchester City their first Premier League title in 2012.

programme.title: PL 30: Leicester City's Miracle
programme.desc: In a story only the Premier League could write, Leicester took the 2015-2016 season by storm, riding a wave of form and momentum all the way to title success under the 'Tinkerman' Ranieri.

programme.title: PL 30: Liverpool's First PL Title
programme.desc: In an unprecedented time, 2020 was the year Liverpool's 30-year wait for a league title came to an end, as Jurgen Klopp turned Reds from doubters to believers with the Premier League crown.

programme.title: New: Sir Elton John: Watford Forever
programme.desc: A Premier League special.

programme.title: Premier League Years
programme.desc: Revisit the annals of Premier League history with the 2022-2023 season, a campaign that saw Manchester City and Pep Guardiola rewrite what is possible in English club football.

programme.title: Gary Neville's Soccerbox
programme.desc: Gary Neville is joined by fellow Premier League legend Roy Keane, as the pair reflect on the matches that defined their glory years of the late '90s and early 2000s at United.

programme.title: Southgate: Life As England Manager
programme.desc: Gareth Southgate speaks to Sky Sports News about life as England manager and his hopes of winning the European Championships in 2024.

programme.title: Cesc Fabregas: My Italian Job
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes in Italy with former Arsenal, Chelsea and Barcelona midfielder Cesc Fabregas as he takes on his first senior managerial role with Italian Serie B team Como.

programme.title: The United Way
programme.desc: The story of Manchester United Football Club, co-written and narrated by Eric Cantona and featuring insight from David Beckham, Peter Schmeichel, Teddy Sheringham and more.

programme.title: Everton: Howard's Way
programme.desc: Documentary film telling the story of Everton and how they reached their their trophy-winning peak in the 1980s under the stewardship of Howard Kendall.

programme.title: Hurst: The First And Only
programme.desc: Geoff Hurst's life is about much more than scoring that hat-trick in the 1966 World Cup Final. Join him as he discusses his journey. Sky Original film.

programme.title: Lionesses: How Football Came Home
programme.desc: Revisit the Lionesses' victorious summer, as Sarina Wiegman's side triumphed under the Wembley arch to bring home the Women's Euros.

programme.title: Gascoigne
programme.desc: A moving look at the life and career of troubled England football genius Paul Gascoigne. Documentary with contributions from Gary Lineker and José Mourinho.

programme.title: Class Of '92: Full Time
programme.desc: After a January rebuild, the Class of '92 hope reinforcements will lead a late charge for promotion. Gary Neville's trip to visit David Beckham in Miami is cut short. (S3, ep 2).

programme.title: The Overlap On Tour: London
programme.desc: Roy, Gary and Jamie are in the capital to referee a Sunday League match, visit a pie & mash shop and take to the Wembley stage with special guests. (S1, ep 2 of 4).

programme.title: PL Greatest: Swindon/Man Utd 1994

programme.desc: Take a look back at all the most memorable moments from the 1999-2000 season. Alex Ferguson's Red Devils were the team everybody feared.
